questions.question: Biology of the scientific study of _____
questions.explanation: Biology is the study of forms of life and the interactions between life forms.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of a living organism?
questions.explanation: Viruses are not considered living, because they are not made of cells.

questions.question: All organisms have DNA.
questions.explanation: All organism contain some form of DNA.

questions.question: _____ are the basic units of life.
questions.explanation: Cells are the building blocks of life; all life contains at least one cell.
